document_data.name: Leech
document_data.refs5e: [[Dragon+ 12|''The Barber of Silverymoon'']] states that leeches should be treated as a swarm of insects.
document_data.mainbody: '''Leeches''' were a species of segmented [[worm]]s.{{Cite dragon/123/Ecology of the Giant Leech|51}}
document_data.Description: Leeches were slimy and had a slug-like appearance.
document_data.Combat: Leeches typically hid themselves within the mud or slime typical of their habitats, then waited to strike upon any warm-blooded creature that passed them by. Though sometimes feeding solitarily, they would sometimes group up into large swarms numbering up to two or five hundred members.
document_data.History:
In the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' was known to sell [[jar]]s full of live leeches for 10 [[gp]].

In the late 15{{th}} century DR, a barber in [[Silverymoon]] by the name of [[Jooge Nopsmoth]] charged patrons a single gold piece to have blood extracted by means of leeches. He collected these leeches from a disused well beneath his store.{{Cite dragon+/12/The Barber of Silverymoon|4-5}}

Sub-Species.Giant leech: A monstrous variety of the standard leech.
Sub-Species.Subterranean: There were some species of leeches in the Realms that were native to subterranean habitats. One such species lived in the mud flats of [[Llurth Dreir]].<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/140/Llurth Dreier: City of Ooze|14}}
Sub-Species.Throat leech: ;Threeb: A variety of leech that was native to the jungles and swamps of the [[Abyss]], such as the [[Layers_of_the_Abyss#Layer_88:_Gaping_Maw|Gaping Maw]] and [[Layers_of_the_Abyss#Layer_128:_Slugbed|Slugbed]].{{Cite dragon/421/Abyssal Trade Goods: Not a Bad Thing|32}}

Ecology.Diet: These creatures fed upon the blood of warm-blooded creatures.
Ecology.Habitats:
Leeches were only known to be found in the waters of temperate swamps and marshes. the [[Lake of Steam]], and the jungle within the [[Cathedral of Emerald Scales]]. They were also quite prevalent in the marshes of [[High Moor]].

Beyond Faer√ªn, they could be found in pools of water all throughout [[Chu' Yuan]]. During the summer season, swarms of them could be found in the lakes, rivers, and swamps of the [[Ama Basin]]. And in the [[Crowded Sea]], they could be found on the island of [[Djinni's Claws]].

Beyond the [[Prime Material plane]], they could be found in the [[Para-Elemental Plane of Ooze]] and the [[Domains of Dread]].
Ecology.Usage: Many peoples in the Realms would turn to the use of leeches when traditional medicines didn't prove effective. This belief was so widespread that they had somewhat of a placebo effect. Some even claimed they could be used to cure [[lycanthropy]], though this was blatantly false.
